description:
IVSO Slim Smart Cover Case for LG G PAD 8.3 Edition Tablet  with Auto Sleep/Wake Function(Black )Custom designed for your precious LG G PAD8.3  Edition tablet . This IVSO case features a combination of functionality and style. Premium quality PU leather boosts a classy look; no-

scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection; Access to all controls and features. Well built to protect your LG G PAD8.3 Edition  tablet for the years to 
come.
title: IVSO LG G PAD 8.3 Ultra Lightweight Slim Smart Cover Case with Auto Sleep/Wake Function-will only fit LG G PAD 8.3 Tablet (Black)
